item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 29, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The world knows Wim Hof as "The Iceman", his family suffered domestic violence (42 points | 3 comments)
2. Too much efficiency makes everything worse (2022) (388 points | 148 comments)
3. Text2CAD Generating Sequential CAD Designs from Text Prompts (29 points | 5 comments)
4. Feldera Incremental Compute Engine (28 points | 2 comments)
5. NASA is selling a brand-new Moon rover: Never used, one previous owner (31 points | 17 comments)
6. SpaceX launches mission for 2 NASA astronauts who are stuck on the ISS (254 points | 223 comments)
7. How Discord stores trillions of messages (2023) (274 points | 121 comments)
8. Notes on the Crystal Language (101 points | 33 comments)
9. Show HN: htmgo - build simple and scalable systems with golang + htmx (72 points | 20 comments)
10. How can a jigsaw have two distinct solutions? [video] (34 points | 9 comments)
11. Cores That Don't Count [pdf] (70 points | 9 comments)
12. Measuring Developers' Jobs-to-be-done (34 points | 3 comments)
13. Show HN: Iceoryx2 – Fast IPC Library for Rust, C++, and C (78 points | 17 comments)
14. The perils of transition to 64-bit time_t (235 points | 172 comments)
15. My Experience Getting Licensed in Ham Radio (2020) (23 points | 11 comments)
16. Micro: The magazine for TRS-80 owners (15 points | 3 comments)
17. Reverse-engineering a three-axis attitude indicator from the F-4 fighter plane (171 points | 58 comments)
18. So you want to make pixel art for an Apple II (22 points | 6 comments)
19. Floating megabomb heaves to near the English coast (120 points | 145 comments)
20. Illusions of Competence in Monitoring One's Knowledge During Study [pdf] (21 points | 2 comments)
21. Overbooking – how providers divide up the bandwidth (4 points | 2 comments)
22. The Little Typer (2018) (156 points | 31 comments)
23. Solving climate change by abusing thermodynamic scaling laws (36 points | 26 comments)
24. IBM PC 5150 Model Numbers (27 points | 1 comment)
25. Will plants grow on the moon? (71 points | 81 comments)
26. Cat memes went viral 100 years ago (121 points | 30 comments)
27. FFT-based ocean-wave rendering, implemented in Godot (757 points | 93 comments)
28. Theattyr: A terminal theater for playing VT100 art and animations (34 points | 3 comments)
29. REPL for Dart (97 points | 45 comments)
30. NTSB Issues Urgent Safety Recommendations on Boeing 737 Rudder System (19 points | 17 comments)
